Text: There are around 233 species in the genus "Utricularia", belonging to the Bladderwort family (Lentibulariaceae).

Text: List of Utricularia species:  It is the largest genus of carnivorous plants and has a worldwide distribution, being absent only from Antarctica and the oceanic islands.

Text: List of Utricularia species:  This genus was considered to have 250 species until Peter Taylor reduced the number to 214 in his exhaustive study, "The genus Utricularia - a taxonomic monograph", published by HMSO (1989).

Text: List of Utricularia species:  This list follows the subgeneric classification "sensu" Müller & Borsch (2005), updated with new information in Müller et al. (2006).
